sentences.en: An analogy is often used to clarify the mechanism of conduction in a semiconductor.
sentences.cn: 为了弄清半导体中的导电机制,常常采用一种比喻.

sentences.en: But the oxidation of RB - SiC does't affect largely on its electric conduction.
sentences.cn: 氧化过程对 反应烧结 碳化硅材料的导电性能影响不大.

sentences.en: Complete and accept qualification, conduction license manages a gender.
sentences.cn: 竣工验收合格性, 办理许可经营性.

sentences.en: Copper is a good medium for the conduction of heat and electricity.
Its film has special performances in flame - retardant and electronic - conduction.
sentences.cn: 漆膜具有 长期 稳定的导静电性及阻燃性.

sentences.en: Its film has special performances in flame - retardant, heat - resistant, electronic - conduction.
sentences.cn: 本品漆膜具有遇火不燃 、 耐热和漆膜全寿命导静电能力.

sentences.en: Nerve compression produces two contrary influences on the conduction of pain signal.
sentences.cn: 神经压迫可以对感觉信号的传导产生两种不同的影响.

sentences.en: Nervous tissue is specialized for conduction.
sentences.cn: 神经组织的特殊功能是传导功能.

sentences.en: Temperature becomes uniform by heat conduction until finally a permanent state is reached.
sentences.cn: 温度通过热传导变得一致，直到最终达到恒定状态。

sentences.en: The inertia terms and those relating to conduction in the X direction were also negligible.
sentences.cn: 惯性项和那些与X方向的导热有关的项也被略去.

sentences.en: The odd harmonics increment mainly results from the diode - conduction asymmetry.
sentences.cn: 其中,二极管导通非对称性是导致奇次谐波增大的主要原因.

sentences.en: The suspensor is thought to function as a channel for the conduction of food materials.
sentences.cn: 胚柄被认为是作为运输营养物质的通道.

sentences.en: There is hardly any conduction of heat in fluids.
sentences.cn: 流体中的热几乎不能传导.

sentences.en: Uses graphic analytic method to find the eigenvalues of heat conduction equations.
sentences.cn: 摘要采用图解分析法求出热传导方程的特征值.

sentences.en: We now believe that these materials conduct by a process known as hole conduction.
sentences.cn: 现今我们知道,这些材料的导电过程是所谓“空穴导电”.
